history.proof: scongruence use: scal_distr_r, scal_opp_l unfold: Ring.AbelianGroup, AbelianGroup.sort, minus.

exceptions.tactic: intros T U f D Hf Hopen.

exceptions.exn: The reference Hopen was not found in the current environment.
The reference Hlocf was not found in the current environment.
The reference eps was not found in the current environment.
The reference Hf was not found in the current environment.

original: intros T U f D Hf Hopen. unfold open in *. intros x HDfx. specialize (Hopen (f x) HDfx) as Hlocf. unfold locally in *. destruct Hlocf as [eps Heps]. exists eps. intros y Hball. apply Hf; auto.
